title: Has Eli Manning played his last game with the Giants?
itunes:title: Has Eli Manning played his last game with the Giants?
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Colleen Wolfe react to the breaking news out of New York that the Giants have benched Eli Manning and will start Geno Smith in Week 13 (1:00), debate where the decision came from and whether Eli has played his last game with the Giants (5:00); The heroes recap Monday night's showdown between the Texans and Ravens (13:00); The news of the suspensions for Michael Crabtree and Aqib Talib after their brawl in Oakland (19:30); Reaction to Chuck Pagano's bizarre Groundhog Day press conference rant (29:00); Hot takes … DESTROYED, where the heroes each discuss a "hot take" that they'd like to debunk (35:00); An update on #ATNCat, including a special announcement and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
